text: Great price, and good sushi, but when I eat the buffet dishes, I get some gastrointestinal problems.  If you have a strong stomach this place is fine I'm sure, but if you're a little sensitive to MSG and the like, stick with the sushi and fruit, and stay away from anything with a sauce on it.
